group_1.textLeft: How is it, have you found anything out of place?
I've been checking spots where they@could have planted something, but...

group_1.textRight: Well, I looked in everyone's rooms,@but I didn't see anything...
It doesn't look like they did anything in@the bathroom or kitchen, either...
I've been searchin' all over the basement,@but nothing looks odd.

group_1.textLeft: Felicia and Yachiyo are still desperately@combing the place over, but...

group_1.textRight: It doesn't look like anything's been messed with?

group_1.textLeft: I don't think there's anything here@that's really worth stealing, either.

group_1.progressNarration: [textBlack:  "I suppose what I really desire is@  to do my best for the Land of the@  Rising Sun, and make the world@  a happy place for everyone."]

[textBlack:  "Since coming to Kamihama I've@  encountered many people, and@  come to understand there is more@  evil in the world than I thought.@  Still, I'm sure that there are@  things the Tokime Clan can do."]
[textBlack:  "Once I figure out what we can do,@  I'm sure that the clan will follow@  me as their leader, and we'll be@  able to all work together for@  that end."]
[textBlack:  "Though I am a bit worried that@  even if I make a mistake,@  none of them will try to stop me."]

[textBlack:  "Once this conflict is over and the@  Tokime Clan can face their goals@  with clear hearts, I'd like us to@  become more familiar with the@  world I've come to learn of@  since going to the city."]
[textBlack:  "For example, there's this thing@  called a 'theme park' that I'd love@  to take the whole clan to!"]
